title: Buckhead Treasures
shortDescription: Explore the upscale charm of Buckhead with this delightful scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: Discover the luxury and history of Buckhead, from iconic landmarks to beautiful parks and trendy spots. Perfect for a day of adventure in one of Atlanta’s most vibrant neighborhoods!

missions.title: The Shops Buckhead Atlanta
missions.shortDescription: Begin your journey at The Shops Buckhead Atlanta, a hub of luxury shopping and dining.
missions.hint: Hint: Look for the area filled with upscale boutiques and designer brands.

missions.title: Atlanta History Center
missions.shortDescription: Learn about Atlanta's past at the renowned Atlanta History Center.
missions.hint: Hint: This spot features the Swan House and beautiful gardens.

missions.title: Chastain Park
missions.shortDescription: Take a stroll through Chastain Park, one of Buckhead’s largest green spaces.
missions.hint: Hint: Look for the park with jogging trails, picnic areas, and an amphitheater.

missions.title: Lenox Square Mall
missions.shortDescription: Visit the iconic Lenox Square Mall, a staple of Buckhead shopping.
missions.hint: Hint: Look for the bustling mall with a mix of high-end and popular stores.

missions.title: Buckhead Diner
missions.shortDescription: End your adventure with a meal at the classic Buckhead Diner.
missions.hint: Hint: This spot is known for its retro vibe and delicious comfort food.
